ButtonResponseType.description: Describes the button or component that resulted in the Button Response.

ContentButtonResponse.description:
Button response content.

Button response object representing the click of a structured message button, such as a
quick reply, list picker selections etc.

id.description: An ID assigned to the button response (Deprecated).

originatingMessageId.description:
Reference to the ID of the original message (e.g., list picker) this button response is
replying to.

payload.description: The response payload associated with the clicked button or selected item.

text.description: The response text from the button click or selection.

type.description: Describes the button or component that resulted in the Button Response.

ContentCardAction.description:
A card action that a user can take.

The default button action.

payload.description:
Text to be returned as the payload from a ButtonResponse when a button is clicked. The
payload and text are a combination which will have to be unique across each card and
carousel in order to determine which button was clicked in that card or carousel.

text.description: The response text from the button click.

url.description: A URL of a web page to direct the user to.

description.description: Text to show in the description.

title.description: Text to show in the title.

dateTime.description: The date and times of the event being scheduled.

dateMinimum.description: The minimum Date Enabled in the datepicker calendar

title.description: Text to show in the title.
